page.title: 19A DAY IN NANCY'S LIFE
page.content: {Every school day}I get up at ten to eight, dress, wash and go downstairs to have breakfast with my Mum and Dad. Next I help let out our hens and ducks and feed them.Then I brush my teeth and go to school with my Mum.In the winter we go in the car and in the summer we walk.{School starts at {9.00am}but some of us get there early.During the day{we work in the {classroom at different things}and have several playtimes.Between 12 noon and 1.00pm it is dinnertime.On Wednesdays all the juniors go swimming.{At 3.00pm {we go home.}When I get home,I wash,put on old clothes and go and play until the children's programmes start on television.
